data.name: AnniversaryEventTypeName
data.value: Anniversary

data.name: BirthdayEventTypeName
data.value: Birthday

data.name: EditButtonTitle
data.value: Edit
data.comment: Title of the button that edits the event

data.name: EventCardTitle
data.value: {0} is celebrating {1} with the team.

data.name: EventDoesNotExistMessage
data.value: Sorry, I couldn't find this event.

data.name: EventPassedMessage
data.value: The event occurrence has already passed.

data.name: EventPreviewCardHeader
data.value: {0} is celebrating {1} with the team.

data.name: EventPreviewMessageText
data.value: Hi {0}, you have an upcoming event in the next 3 days. If you take no action, I will post this celebration.

data.name: EventShareMessage
data.value: Looks like you joined a new team. Would you like to share your events in {0} as well?

data.name: EventSkippedMessage
data.value: Ok, I'll skip "{0}" this year and won't share it with your teams.

data.name: GetStartedButtonText
data.value: Get started

data.name: IgnoreEventShare
data.value: Ok, if you change your mind you can share the events from the Events tab.

data.name: MultipleEventsMessage
data.value: Stop the presses! Today {0} and {1}. That's a lot of merrymaking for one day—pace yourselves!
data.comment: Message sent for a card with multiple events. {0} is the list of events except for the last one, {1} is the last event.

data.name: MultipleEventsSummary
data.value: We're celebrating multiple events today!
data.comment: Summary text for the message posted when there are multiple events to celebrate.

data.name: NoThanksButtonTitle
data.value: No, thanks

data.name: OtherEventTypeName
data.value: Other

data.name: ShareButtonTitle
data.value: Share

data.name: ShareWithTeamGenericError
data.value: Some error occurred while share your events with team. Please try again.

data.name: ShareWithTeamNotAMemberError
data.value: You are no longer a member of {0}.
data.comment: Error message when we don't find the user in the team roster. {0} is the name of the team.

data.name: ShareWithTeamsNotInstalledError
data.value: Someone uninstalled me from {0}, I can no longer share these events there.
data.comment: Error message when we don't find the team in the database. {0} is the name of the team.

data.name: ShareWithTeamSuccessMessage
data.value: I’ve set those events to be shared with the team when they occur.

data.name: SingleEventMessage
data.value: <at>{0}</at> is celebrating {1}
data.comment: Message sent for an event. {0} is the name of the person celebrating, {1} is the name of the event.

data.name: SkipButtonTitle
data.value: Skip
data.comment: Title of the button that skips the event

data.name: SkippedStaleEventMessage
data.value: Sorry, the event is either already passed, or has been changed since this card was sent.
data.comment: Message shown when the user acts on an event card that is stale.

data.name: TakeATourButtonText
data.value: Take a tour

data.name: TourTaskModuleTitle
data.value: Tour
data.comment: Title of the tour task module

data.name: WelcomeMessageForTeam
data.value: I'm the Celebrations bot. {0} installed me in {1}. I’m here to help everyone celebrate birthdays, anniversaries, and anything else you tell me about.
data.comment: Text of the welcome card sent to the team

data.name: WelcomeMessageForTeamTitle
data.value: Hi!
data.comment: Title of the welcome card sent to the team

data.name: WelcomeMessageForUserTitle
data.value: Hi!
data.comment: Title of the welcome card sent to a user

data.name: WelcomeMessagePart1
data.value: Thanks for installing me. I’m ready to help you celebrate special events with your team. Currently you don’t have me in any of your teams

data.name: WelcomeMessagePart2
data.value: Click get started to start adding your own events.

data.name: WelcomeMessagePart3
data.value: Then install me in a team so that I can help you and your team members remember and share their events.

data.name: WelcomeMessagePart4
data.value: I’m ready to help you celebrate special events with your team. Click get started to add your own events.
